ModMetaData.name: Power++
ModMetaData.author: aRandomKiwi
ModMetaData.description:
Trade power (buy and sell) with factions, share power between your colonies and all other maps (caravan, quest,...), connect electrical devices to wireless powergrids (no cables), thanks to the wireless power network technologies research.
Hack and use the dangerous energy from the ancient network of power-collection satellites.
Hijack the wireless power network technologies and use it as powerful weapons with the A.R.E.S system.
Fully customizable.
Version <color=#FFD800>1.8.3</color> for Rimworld.
